# CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayer

**Protocol**

A protocol that defines an advanced pattern player capable of looping, seeking, pausing, and resuming haptic playback.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayer : CHHapticPatternPlayer
```

## Overview

Create instances of this pattern player through a [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEngine] object by calling a factory method such as [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticEngine/makeAdvancedPlayer(with:)]. When you ask an advanced pattern player to play, pause, or resume a haptic pattern, the player submits those commands to the haptic engine on your behalf.

Unlike [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticPatternPlayer], the advanced pattern player supports looping of haptic and audio patterns, by setting [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayer/loopEnabled]. The advanced pattern player can also call a block when the player finishes, through its [doc://com.apple.corehaptics/documentation/CoreHaptics/CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayer/completionHandler] property.

## Setting Playback Properties

- **loopEnabled**: A Boolean that determines whether the haptic repeats itself on completion.
- **loopEnd**: The time at which to end looping haptic playback.
- **playbackRate**: The playback rate of the haptic player.
- **completionHandler**: A completion block that runs after the haptic finishes playing.
- **CHHapticAdvancedPatternPlayerCompletionHandler**: A typealias for the completion handler to run after a haptic finishes playback.

## Controlling Playback

- **pause(atTime:)**: Pauses the haptic player during playback.
- **resume(atTime:)**: Resumes playing a paused haptic.
- **seek(toOffset:)**: Jumps to the specified offset time in playing the haptic.

## Silencing Haptic Playback

- **isMuted**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to silences all haptic and audio output from the player.

## Essentials

- **Preparing your app to play haptics**: Set up your app to play haptics.
- **Playing a single-tap haptic pattern**: Create and play a transient haptic pattern from a dictionary literal inline.
- **CHHapticEngine**: An object that represents the connection to the haptic server.
- **CHHapticPattern**: An object representing a haptic waveform.
- **CHHapticPatternPlayer**: A protocol that defines a standard pattern player capable of playing haptic patterns with fixed parameters.

## Inherits From

- CHHapticPatternPlayer
- NSObjectProtocol
